notes: Used for Enki and Enlil (XIII), Defender Z (X), Magic Master (VI)

effects: KO'd, can't act, persists after battle
Notes:

* Abilities described as "remove negative effects", like Esuna, remove the status 200 (Poison), 201 (Silence), 202 (Paralyze), 203 (Confuse), 210 (Blind), 211 (Sleep), 212 (Petrify), 215 (Berserk), 221 (Mini), 222 (Toad) and 524 (Doom of Atomos).

* Abilities described as "remove positive effects", like Dispel,  remove the status 204 (Haste), 207 (Protect), 208 (Shell), 209 (Reflect), 216 (Low Regen), 247 (Medium Regen), 243 (High Regen), 50045 (Phantom Regen), 50141 (Regenga) and 240 (Triple).
